author: abcoathup
content:
We have had multiple PRs for EIP-0 (Ground Zero)
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7488

It is an annoyance factor as well as using up EIP/ERC numbers (until we get to 7500)

There is an option to block a user from a public repository if it becomes necessary: https://github.blog/2016-04-04-organizations-can-now-block-abusive-users/
